column4: hwo can i tell if my remote ubuntu server is accepting anything on port 1194
can you ss into it?
ssh
hrm
i tried to ssh into xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:1194 but it's not doing anything
does ssh work with all ports greezmunkey?
i thought it's just 22 23
i configured my client to connect on 22
and the server seems to accept on 22
ssh into your server, if it is set up for that, and then check which ports it is listening on.
i see this: tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:1194            0.0.0.0:*               LISTEN
what does that mean..
human it means it is listening...on that port number.
my remote server is listening on that port number?
how would I confirm this greezmunkey
apparently the output looks like it's giving me lip service
like from a remote place.
i'm in windows
It looks like you are running OpenVPN on it, is that right?
yes..
the server is running.  i can't seem to get my client to connect it keeps timing out or something
i made some windows firewall exceptions
stop and restart the openvpn service, then try connecting to it again.
